title: 2BD 2BA, Deep soaker style bathtubs, In Denver
posting_body: ['2 BD | 2 BA | 1035 SQFT', 'Welcome Home To Neon Local Enjoy a truly modern urban living experience at Neon Local Apartments – with on site retail options, a private parking garage, and a coveted rooftop deck and lounge right at your fingertips.', 'Our stunning interiors feature wood-style plank flooring, oversized walk-in closets, and in-home laundry options that will make you proud to call us home.', 'Not to mention how simple it is to make the most of every moment in Denver’s South Broadway neighborhood!', 'Located just moments away from the Alameda Light Rail Station and walking distance to favorites like Voodoo Doughnuts and Punch Bowl Social, convenience is literally yours for the taking.', 'There are countless infamous Denver breweries, hot spot hangouts, and eateries that South Broadway is known for right outside your door.', 'Find your new home and an illuminated lifestyle when you choose Neon Local Apartments!', 'Apartment Features:', 'Air conditioning with programmable thermostat-Wood-style plank flooring-Stainless steel appliances including built-in microwave, French door refrigerator, and dishwasher
